product.longDescription:
Day-neutral. Tarpan starts producing abundant, 1-1 1/2", deep rose flowers in about 85 days. Plant in a hanging basket, container, or in the ground. The bright red, small to medium-size berries are plentiful, tasty, and will produce from midsummer to frost. Produces runners. Edible ornamental. Grows best in Zones 5-8.

• Edible Flowers: Flowers add a mild, strawberry-like flavor if sprinkled on salads or when used as a garnish for drinks and desserts.

Avg. 59,700 seeds/oz. Packet: 15 seeds.
